subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] It can get pretty strange.
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1208970276
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Now why would Gabriel need a gun?
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 4/22/2008 12:15:45 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
"The four archangels represent different fields of modern science. Gabriel  
is the patron of computers and the Internet." From 
_www.pyracantha.www.www.pyracantha_ (http://www.pyracantha.com/religious.html) 

Also  " 
The Archangel Gabriel   Archangel of the West and of Water, Gabriel is the 
Messenger of God. And is  well known for his announcement of the birth of Jesus.
He is connected with  our emotions, cleansing, loving and intuitive self. And 
can aid you with your  spiritual insight, growth and travels on the astral 
planes.
Also connected  with the Moon, and the sea and all life that is within.If you 
are working with  dolphins, he is your contact.
Present at our births he occasionally turns  up at our final transition to 
ease us through. "

From _sanctuary-of-sanctuary-of-sanctuasanctuary-o_ 
(http://sanctuary-of-enlightenment.8m.com/photo4.html) 



A  weird Gabriel reference, and a Bruce comment. From a recording done Sunday 
 night. 

Frank-S

 
____________________________________
